original_title: The David Susskind Show: Give 'em Hell Harry
overview: In 1961, David Susskind conducted a series of interviews with former President Harry Truman in Truman's hometown of Independence, Missouri. After picking Truman up at his home to take him to the Truman Presidential Library for the interviews over a number of days.
title: The David Susskind Show: Give 'em Hell Harry
